channel.title: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?
channel.description: Ok, I have about 9,000 fonts to chose from and no matter what, I always pick a bad looking font. So, How do I pick a good font? Are there any steps I go through to pick a good one? Help :P

item.title: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?
item.dc:creator: @poor_noob poor noob
item.description:
@poor_noob wrote:

Well i first.. you dont have the fonts saved to the windows fonts do you? and for my fonts i usually highlight my text then click up in the scoll down box, they both should be highlited. Then i just scroll down the list till i find a font that fits the style of my picture. Just think of the killer font that would look perfect in there, then find it also adding some effect to the font makes it better sometimes.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?

item.title: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

It's not that I dislike them all. Sure, there's a few which suck, but at least 5,000 of them kick ass. It is just finding which one will go with the Graphic.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?

item.title: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Pick the first font on the list. Press the down arrow key repeatedly until you find one you like. Have fun.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?

item.title: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?

@Mr.Chris wrote:

Delet my fonts? <3 Fonts!

item.source: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?

item.title: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

It all depends on what type of graphic you're making. What you could do is typing the following:

[Winkey] + [R], cmd, enter, cd .., cd .., cd .., cd windows, cd fonts, del .

9000... :eek:

Read full topic
item.source: Help! How Do You Chose Your Font?
